channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Darden Restaurants earnings disappoint as Olive Garden, fine dining sales struggle
item.description: Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants reported weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue for its fiscal first quarter.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Slip; Oil Prices Rally Further
item.description: The prospect of a widening conflict in the Middle East weighed on major U.S. indexes in early trading.

item.title: Oil Gains Ease After OPEC+ Sticks to Output Policy
item.description: Oil price gains eased after a meeting of top OPEC+ ministers kept policy unchanged—including a plan to start raising output in December—bringing conce...

item.title: Nike withdraws guidance, postpones investor day as it gears up for CEO change
item.description: Nike on Tuesday said it was withdrawing its full-year guidance and postponing its investor day as it gears up for a new CEO to take the helm.

item.title: U.S. Adds to Crude Oil Stockpiles
item.description: Gasoline inventories also rose, while distillate fuel oil stocks fell.

item.title: Saudi Minister Warns of $50 Oil as OPEC+ Members Flout Production Curbs
item.description: The kingdom called out members for overproducing, in what was seen as a veiled threat of a price war.

item.title: Natural Gas Rise on Tight Balance
item.description: The tight balance of supply and demand in natural gas is continuing to support higher prices, which has traders shrugging off warm temperatures in muc...

item.title: We're upping our price target on Costco after another steady quarter fortifies our thesis
item.description: The retailer's fourth-quarter results were mixed, but we have more conviction in Costco's appeal to shoppers.

item.title: H&M shares fall as much as 8% on profit miss and scrapped earnings margin target
item.description: Shares of H&M tumbled as much as 8% on Thursday after the world's second-largest listed fashion retailer posted a miss on operating profit.

item.title: Stellantis and Aston Martin shares drop sharply after profit warnings amid China woes
item.description: Stocks of European carmakers hemorrhaged early on Monday as Stellantis and British luxury brand Aston Martin issued profit warnings.
